Package jsoul.midi

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Playable
    The interface for a Playable object (Note, Chord, Track, or Sequence).
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Chord
    Represents a MIDI chord, containing multiple stacked notes.
    Dynamics
    A class which provides useful values for setting velocities (i.e.
    Instrument
    Represents a MIDI instrument.
    MidiFile
    Represents a MIDI file format, and provides an interface to read from and write to .mid files.
    Note
    Represents a MIDI node, with a pitch, velocity, and duration.
    Player
    A class which provides static methods to play Notes, Chords, Tracks, Sequences, and MIDI files.
    Sequence
    Represents a MIDI sequence, comprised of several layered Tracks, each containing some subsequence of notes and chords.
    Track
    Represents a MIDI track, containing a sequence of notes and Chords, as well as an instrument.
